item.title: PowerBI with Cloudflare
item.description:
Using Power BI to Visualise Cloudflare Data: A Simple Guide

Recently, Iâ€™ve been working with Power BI to build dashboards. One particular requirement involved pulling in data from Cloudflare to display statistics on blocked traffic.
